channel.title: Events and Activities on Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society
channel.description: Recent content in Events and Activities on Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society

item.title: Cardiff Microwave Roundtable
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: About Program Venue Attendees Attendee List Attendees who opted-in to being listed online are included here. It was great to have so many people with a broad set of interests at the event.

item.title: Cardiff Microwave Roundtable
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: About Program Venue Attendees CUARS hosted a meeting of the UK Microwave Group on Saturday March 16, 2019 at our campus in Cardiff.

item.title: Cardiff Microwave Roundtable
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: About Program Venue Attendees Talks Microwave Moonbounce Communication Peter Blair - G3LTF The talk briefly covers the history of this fascinating mode of radio communication from WW2 to the present.

item.title: Cardiff Microwave Roundtable
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: About Program Venue Attendees Venue The Roundtable was held in the West and South Queen’s Buildings of Cardiff University’s engineering department.

item.title: Cardiff Microwave Roundtable
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: About Program Venue Attendees Register Attendee List Attendees who have opted-in to being listed online are included here.

item.title: Cardiff Microwave Roundtable
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: About Program Venue Attendees Register The Cardiff University ARS will host a meeting of the UK Microwave Group on Saturday March 7, 2020 at our campus in Cardiff.

item.title: Cardiff Microwave Roundtable
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: About Program Venue Attendees An SDR based Beacon Project Third year students in Cardiff University’s Electronics Engineering program complete a course in which they design and build a project.

item.title: Cardiff Microwave Roundtable
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: About Program Venue Attendees Register Registration We request that you pre-register so we can accurately judge the amount of food and beverages to have on hand and so we can reserve enough space at dinner.

item.title: Cardiff Microwave Roundtable
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: About Program Venue Attendees Register Venue The Roundtable will be held again in the West and South Queen’s Buildings of Cardiff University’s engineering department.

item.title: GNU Radio Workshop
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: Cancelled Not enough people registered so this event has had to be delayed until a later date. If you are interested in attending a future workshop please email john@bravoao.

item.title: Radio Direction Finding Event - Give It A Go!
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: Facebook Event Wednesday October 6, 2019 3 PM - 4:30 PM Meeting Place Ground floor entry Trevithick Building 5 The Parade

item.title: Train the Trainers
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: The RSGB will be running a Train the Trainers one day course in Cardiff on Saturday, April 18th. The event will be hosted by the Cardiff University ARS in the Engineering and Computer Science building.
